title: Did Robert Smalls steal a Confederate ship to save himself and others from slavery?
subtitle: Mimi accurately recounts the life of a man born in slavery, stole a Confederate ship to save his fellow slaves, became a war hero, and was elected to the United States Congress.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A man named Robert Smalls escaped slavery, along with his family and other slaves, by stealing a Confederate ship and was later elected to the United States House of Representatives.
